attributes.action: put England back on the map!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that we cannot say we are English without being branded either nationalistic or racist? I want to be able to say I'm English and proud of our diverse country. I propose that England is recognised as a country and not just part of Great Britain. I want to be able to put that I am English on every form rather than British, and propose that St.George's day be a national holiday.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
